quote: We are the knights who say ‘Ni!’
author: Knights of Ni

quote: Every time I try to talk to someone it’s ‘sorry this’ and ‘forgive me that’ and ‘I’m not worthy.’
author: God

quote: Help! Help! I’m being repressed! Come see the violence inherent in the system! Violence inherent in the system!
author: Dennis

quote: No, now go away before I taunt you a second time.
author: French Soldier

quote: Don’t like her? What’s wrong with her. She’s beautiful, she’s rich, she’s got huge … tracts of land.
author: King of the Swamp Castle
